Book.Author: George Orwell
Book.Description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society under constant surveillance.

Book.Title: The Hobbit
Book.Author: J.R.R. Tolkien
Book.Description: A fantasy adventure about a hobbit's journey to reclaim a lost kingdom.

Book.Title: Pride and Prejudice
Book.Author: Jane Austen
Book.Description: A classic romance novel exploring themes of love and social standing.

Book.Title: Dune
Book.Author: Frank Herbert
Book.Description: An epic science fiction saga set on the desert planet of Arrakis.

Book.Title: The Great Gatsby
Book.Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Book.Description: A novel about the American dream and the excesses of the Jazz Age.

Book.Title: Foundation
Book.Author: Isaac Asimov
Book.Description: A science fiction series about the fall and rise of a galactic empire.

Book.Title: The Lord of the Rings
Book.Author: J.R.R. Tolkien
Book.Description: An epic fantasy tale of the quest to destroy a powerful ring.

Book.Title: Brave New World
Book.Author: Aldous Huxley
Book.Description: A dystopian novel exploring a future society driven by technology and control.
